concept_data.title: United Nations International Research and Training Institute for the Advancement of Women
concept_data.preferred_term: UN International Research and Training Institute for the Advancement of Women

summary: The "UN International Research and Training Institute for the Advancement of Women" (UN-INSTRAW) is a specialized agency of the United Nations focused on promoting gender equality and empowering women through research and training initiatives. In the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, UN-INSTRAW plays a pivotal role in shaping policies that align with the EU's commitment to gender mainstreaming and the advancement of women's rights. As a redirect, this concept emphasizes the importance of recognizing UN-INSTRAW's contributions to EU objectives, particularly in fostering collaboration on international standards and best practices for gender equality, thereby enhancing the efficacy of EU legal instruments and directives.
